#labels Procedures
Waits on the host thread for commands identified by event objects to complete.

Interface to OpenCL [http://www.khronos.org/registry/cl/sdk/1.1/docs/man/xhtml/clWaitForEvents.html clWaitForEvents].

== Interface ==
<code language="Fortran">
  subroutine clWaitForEvents(event, errcode_ret)
    type(cl_event),         intent(in)    :: event
    integer,                intent(out)   :: errcode_ret
  end subroutine clWaitForEvents
</code>
